name: Google Slides
title: workspace.google.com/products/slides
shortDescription: Google Slides allows users to create, manage, and share presentations directly from their browser without any installations. It's designed for individuals, teams, and enterprises who need to collaborate effectively, regardless of location. An example use case includes a team collaborating on a sales presentation, utilizing real-time editing and content-rich slides with videos and animations.
pros: Integration with other Google Workspace tools
Rich content options including videos and animations
cons: Some features limited to premium plans
Less advanced than some desktop alternatives

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Keynote
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Sleek design, exclusive to Apple devices
